meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jordan Garroway Lisa Beth Davis Kate O’Connor Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7657.

td.p: Jordan Garroway, a mechanical engineer from Rochester, New York
Lisa Beth Davis, a retired Army master sergeant from Altadena, California
Kate O’Connor, an insurance salesperson from Florence, New Jersey (whose 1-day cash winnings total $21,000)

tr.td: CHRISTMAS MOVIES WITH LEONARD MALTIN
SOUNDS LIKE A LIQUOR BRAND
AMERICAN HISTORY
FIRST LADIES OF THE WORLD
"SOCIAL"
SECURITY!
